typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Stock Item Staging Key} as integer,
		{WWI Stock Item ID} as integer,
		{Stock Item} as string,
		Color as string,
		{Selling Package} as string,
		{Buying Package} as string,
		Brand as string,
		Size as string,
		{Lead Time Days} as integer,
		{Quantity Per Outer} as integer,
		{Is Chiller Stock} as boolean,
		Barcode as string,
		{Tax Rate} as decimal(18,3),
		{Unit Price} as decimal(18,2),
		{Recommended Retail Price} as decimal(18,2),
		{Typical Weight Per Unit} as decimal(18,3),
		Photo as binary,
		{Valid From} as timestamp,
		{Valid To} as timestamp,
		{StockItem Surrogate Key} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> IntStockItem
source(output(
		{Stock Item Key} as integer,
		{WWI Stock Item ID} as integer,
		{Stock Item} as string,
		Color as string,
		{Selling Package} as string,
		{Buying Package} as string,
		Brand as string,
		Size as string,
		{Lead Time Days} as integer,
		{Quantity Per Outer} as integer,
		{Is Chiller Stock} as boolean,
		Barcode as string,
		{Tax Rate} as decimal(18,3),
		{Unit Price} as decimal(18,2),
		{Recommended Retail Price} as decimal(18,2),
		{Typical Weight Per Unit} as decimal(18,3),
		Photo as binary,
		{Valid From} as timestamp,
		{Valid To} as timestamp,
		{Lineage Key} as integer,
		iscurrent as boolean,
		{StockItem Surrogate Key} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimStockItem
IntStockItem, DimStockItem lookup(IntStockItem@{WWI Stock Item ID} == DimStockItem@{WWI Stock Item ID},
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupIDs
LookupIDs select(mapColumn(
		{WWI Stock Item ID} = IntStockItem@{WWI Stock Item ID},
		{Stock Item} = IntStockItem@{Stock Item},
		Color = IntStockItem@Color,
		{Selling Package} = IntStockItem@{Selling Package},
		{Buying Package} = IntStockItem@{Buying Package},
		Brand = IntStockItem@Brand,
		Size = IntStockItem@Size,
		{Lead Time Days} = IntStockItem@{Lead Time Days},
		{Quantity Per Outer} = IntStockItem@{Quantity Per Outer},
		{Is Chiller Stock} = IntStockItem@{Is Chiller Stock},
		Barcode = IntStockItem@Barcode,
		{Tax Rate} = IntStockItem@{Tax Rate},
		{Unit Price} = IntStockItem@{Unit Price},
		{Recommended Retail Price} = IntStockItem@{Recommended Retail Price},
		{Typical Weight Per Unit} = IntStockItem@{Typical Weight Per Unit},
		Photo = IntStockItem@Photo,
		{Int Valid From} = IntStockItem@{Valid From},
		{Int Valid To} = IntStockItem@{Valid To},
		{StockItem Surrogate Key} = IntStockItem@{StockItem Surrogate Key},
		{Dim Valid From} = DimStockItem@{Valid From},
		{Dim Valid To} = DimStockItem@{Valid To},
		{Lineage Key},
		iscurrent
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
SelectColumns split(isNull(iscurrent),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionSplit@(NewRow, CheckForUpdates)
ConditionSplit@NewRow derive(iscurrent = true(),
		{Valid From} = currentTimestamp(),
		{Lineage Key} = 2) ~> DerivedColumn1
ConditionSplit@CheckForUpdates, DimStockItem exists(ConditionSplit@CheckForUpdates@{WWI Stock Item ID} == DimStockItem@{WWI Stock Item ID} &&

(
    ConditionSplit@CheckForUpdates@{Stock Item} != DimStockItem@{Stock Item} ||
    ConditionSplit@CheckForUpdates@Color != DimStockItem@Color ||
    ConditionSplit@CheckForUpdates@{Selling Package} != DimStockItem@{Selling Package} ||
    ConditionSplit@CheckForUpdates@{Buying Package} != DimStockItem@{Buying Package} ||
    ConditionSplit@CheckForUpdates@Brand != DimStockItem@Brand ||
    ConditionSplit@CheckForUpdates@Size != DimStockItem@Size ||
    ConditionSplit@CheckForUpdates@{Lead Time Days} != DimStockItem@{Lead Time Days} ||
    ConditionSplit@CheckForUpdates@{Quantity Per Outer} != DimStockItem@{Quantity Per Outer} ||
    ConditionSplit@CheckForUpdates@{Is Chiller Stock} != DimStockItem@{Is Chiller Stock} ||
    ConditionSplit@CheckForUpdates@Barcode != DimStockItem@Barcode ||
    ConditionSplit@CheckForUpdates@{Tax Rate} != DimStockItem@{Tax Rate} ||
    ConditionSplit@CheckForUpdates@{Unit Price} != DimStockItem@{Unit Price} ||
    ConditionSplit@CheckForUpdates@{Recommended Retail Price} != DimStockItem@{Recommended Retail Price} ||
    ConditionSplit@CheckForUpdates@{Typical Weight Per Unit} != DimStockItem@{Typical Weight Per Unit} ||
    ConditionSplit@CheckForUpdates@Photo != DimStockItem@Photo ||
    {Int Valid From} != {Valid From} ||
    {Int Valid To} != {Valid To}
),
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CheckForChanges
CheckForChanges derive({New Valid To} = currentTimestamp()) ~> SetAttrInactive
CheckForChanges derive(iscurrent = true(),
		{New Valid From} = currentTimestamp()) ~> SetAttrUpdate
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Stock Item Key} as integer,
		{WWI Stock Item ID} as integer,
		{Stock Item} as string,
		Color as string,
		{Selling Package} as string,
		{Buying Package} as string,
		Brand as string,
		Size as string,
		{Lead Time Days} as integer,
		{Quantity Per Outer} as integer,
		{Is Chiller Stock} as boolean,
		Barcode as string,
		{Tax Rate} as decimal(18,3),
		{Unit Price} as decimal(18,2),
		{Recommended Retail Price} as decimal(18,2),
		{Typical Weight Per Unit} as decimal(18,3),
		Photo as binary,
		{Valid From} as timestamp,
		{Valid To} as timestamp,
		{Lineage Key} as integer,
		iscurrent as boolean,
		{StockItem Surrogate Key} as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sinkNew
